about_the_game:
Embark on an epic fantasy adventure in SideQuest Hunters, an innovative Idle RPG Roguelite that plays in the corner of your screen. Designed for those who enjoy constant progression and wealth accumulation, this game allows you to venture into a magical world without interrupting your other activities.


KEY FEATURES


- Multitasking: Enjoy the thrill of an RPG without having to dedicate long hours. Ideal for playing while doing other tasks in front of your computer.

- b]Hunt them all[/b]:Advance through the different areas defeating all kinds of enemies. Complete your record of monsters to be the best hunter.

- Sublime pixel art: Enjoy throughout your adventure amazing characters and environments with fantastic pixel-art by the great Rafael Matos.

- b]Automatic Battles[/b]: Engage in strategic battles that unfold automatically, allowing you to concentrate on managing and progressing your heroes.

- Infinity of items: Discover and purchase different items that will make every game feel unique. Build the perfect build to go where no one else has gone before.

- b]Continuous Progression[/b]: Close the game at any time and pick up your adventure where you left off.


UPCOMING UPDATES

.
- New hunters: New hunters will arrive, with unique mechanics, attributes and items.

- New areas and enemies: New zones full of unique enemies, which will add variety and hours of gameplay.

- b]New features and tweaks[/b]: We will listen to the community to bring you the best possible gameplay experience.



Get ready to explore, fight and progress in SideQuest Hunters, where the adventure never stops.


Thank you for playing SideQuest Hunters, we hope it will accompany you during the long hours in front of your computer.

Fdo: CanoCoder & MorenoGameDev
